code: import{useState}from'react';import{parseEther}from'ethers';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CreateNFT=_ref=>{let{contract,onCreate}=_ref;const[imageHash,setImageHash]=useState('');const[price,setPrice]=useState('');const[isCreating,setIsCreating]=useState(false);const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!contract||!imageHash||!price)return;try{setIsCreating(true);const tx=await contract.createNFT(imageHash,parseEther(price));await tx.wait();setImageHash('');setPrice('');onCreate();}catch(error){console.error("Error creating NFT:",error);alert("Error creating NFT: "+error.message);}finally{setIsCreating(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"create-nft-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Create New NFT"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"IPFS Image Hash:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:imageHash,onChange:e=>setImageHash(e.target.value),placeholder:"Qm...",required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Price (ETH):"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:price,onChange:e=>setPrice(e.target.value),placeholder:"0.01",min:"0.01",step:"0.01",required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",disabled:isCreating,children:isCreating?'Creating...':'Create NFT'})]})]});};export default CreateNFT;
